What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Load custom deck
2. Play Noble Hierarch
3. next turn it doesn't highlight in mana context What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Noble Hierarch should be available to give mana What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? this problem i noticed since 1.17, i am using 1.17b on winxp Please provide any additional information below.
